name: Watermelon Bash
description:
IMPORTANT: PLAY IN 1280x600 FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

CONTROLS: PLAYER 1: WASD to move, E to shoot. PLAYER 2: IJKL to move, O to shoot.

Throw cubes at each other and know your melon foe into their goal to score! First to 5 wins and becomes the new leader of Melonopolis. Be careful though! Wander into your opponents goal and they get a point!

Just testing local multiplayer games.
